name: Adidas Runners Partner Workout - Core Activation + Easy Run
about:
Train together, push each other, and make fitness fun with our Partner Workout – Core Activation + Easy Run session! This workout focuses on strengthening your core while enjoying the motivation of training with a partner.

Open to all fitness levels—bring a friend or get paired up with a fellow runner!

What to Bring: Comfortable running gear, water, and a willingness to train together.

Stronger together—train, run, and have fun as a team! See you there!

name: Adidas Runners Speed Session
about:
Take your running to the next level with our Speed Session! This high-intensity workout is designed to improve your pace, power, and overall running efficiency.

Perfect for runners looking to challenge themselves and enhance their speed, whether training for a race or simply looking to push their limits.

name: Adidas Runners Fartlek run + Mobility
about:
Mix up your training with the dynamic combination of a Fartlek Run + Mobility session! This workout blends unstructured speed play with mobility exercises to improve your running efficiency, strength, and flexibility.

What to Expect:

Fartlek Run: A Swedish term meaning "speed play," this run alternates between periods of faster and slower paces, adding variety and fun to your workout while enhancing speed and endurance.
Mobility Drills: Post-run exercises focusing on improving joint flexibility, reducing muscle stiffness, and promoting a full range of motion.
Coaching Guidance: Tips on how to pace yourself during a fartlek and incorporate mobility into your regular training.

Who Can Join:
Perfect for runners of all levels seeking to boost their speed, endurance, and recovery with a playful yet effective workout.

Challenge your body, loosen up, and run free. Join us for this invigorating session that combines the best of both worlds!

name: Adidas Runners Easy Run
about:
Enjoy a relaxed and refreshing run with our Easy Run session! This workout is designed to help you build endurance, recover from intense training, and simply enjoy the rhythm of running.

Open to runners of all levels, whether you’re a beginner or an experienced runner looking for an active recovery day.

What to Bring: Comfortable running gear, water, and a relaxed mindset.

Take it easy, enjoy the run, and find your flow!

name: Adidas Runners Strength Training + Easy Run
about:
Enhance your running efficiency and prevent injuries with our Band Activation + Easy Run session! This workout focuses on activating key muscle groups using resistance bands, followed by a relaxed-paced run.

Ideal for runners of all levels looking to improve strength, stability, and injury prevention.

name: Adidas Runners Speed Session
about:
gnite your pace and build explosive power with our Speed Session! This high-energy workout focuses on improving your running speed, efficiency, and stamina through structured intervals.

Ideal for runners of all levels—whether you're aiming to shave seconds off your race time or simply challenge yourself with a fun, fast-paced workout.

Let’s rev up the pace, power through the session, and take your running to the next level. See you on the track!

name: Adidas Runners Strength Training
about:
Build strength, enhance endurance, and prevent injuries with our Strength Training at Cult Fitness session! This workout is designed to complement your running by improving muscle stability, power, and overall fitness.

Suitable for runners of all levels looking to improve strength, stability, and overall fitness.

Stronger muscles make stronger runners—let’s train smart and get stronger together!

name: Adidas Runners Aerobic Run + Stretching
about:
Boost your endurance and improve flexibility with our Aerobic Run + Stretching session! This workout focuses on maintaining a steady pace to build aerobic capacity, followed by deep stretching for recovery.

Suitable for all levels—whether you’re training for a race or just looking for a solid endurance session.

Stay strong, stay flexible, and keep moving forward!

name: Adidas Runners WWWR - Easy run followed by a chat with Archana Singh
about:
Join us for a special With Women We Run (WWWR) session featuring an Easy Run followed by an inspiring conversation with Archana Singh! This session is all about building community, supporting women in running, and sharing experiences.

Open to all runners, especially those looking to be part of a strong, empowering women’s running community.

name: Adidas Runners Circuit Training + Easy Run
about: Mix things up and elevate your fitness with our Circuit Training + Easy Run session! This event combines high-energy circuit exercises with a relaxed run to build strength, endurance, and overall athletic performance.
